title: Clean Energy and Network Efficiency Improvement Project - Package 04 - Medium Voltage / Distribution Sub. Projects, Lot B
decision_details:
- this project includes the following: 

*	33 kV DC Tower Line from Krirbathkumbura GSS to the proposed Galaha Gantry (15 km) and related works;

*	33 kV DC Tower Line from Galmadu Junction to the proposed  Akkaraipaththu Gantry (18 km) and related works; and

*	33 kV DC Tower Line from  proposed  Akkaraipaththu Gantry to the proposed Pothuvil Gantry (42 km) and related works.

	The  proposal made by Hon. (Mrs.) Pavithra Wanniarachchi, Minister of Power and Energy, to award the above contract to the lowest evaluated substantially responsive bidder as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
